summary: 1968  was a leap year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1968  was a leap year starting on Monday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1968th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 968th year of the 2nd millennium, the 68th year of the 20th century, and the 9th year of the 1960s decade. This was the year of the Protests of 1968.
